ip.description: The last byte of the receiver IP address

description: The geospatial details for the receiver.
The three first coordinates [x,y,z] are relative to the base station
For the three primary receivers (bottom-left, top-left and bottom-right)
it is followed by their MN95 coordinates [E,N,alt] for map display.
In both coordinate systems the Y axis unit vector Yu is norm(topLeft-botLeft)
and the orthogonal X axis clockwise is [Yu.y,-Yu.x].
